description: Mobile techniques used by XcodeGhost, ATT&CK software S0297 v1.1
name: XcodeGhost (S0297)

techniques.comment: XcodeGhost can read and write data in the user’s clipboard.[2]
XcodeGhost can prompt a fake alert dialog to phish user credentials.[2]
XcodeGhost was injected into apps by a modified version of Xcode (Apple's software development tool).[1][2]
